segment.source: Device reset (Surface Hub)
segment.target: Device reset (Surface Hub)

segment.source: You may wish to reset your Microsoft Surface Hub.
segment.target: You may wish to reset your Microsoft Surface Hub.

segment.source: Device reset (Surface Hub)
segment.target: Device reset (Surface Hub)

segment.source: You may wish to reset your Microsoft Surface Hub.
segment.target: You may wish to reset your Microsoft Surface Hub.

segment.source: Typical reasons for a reset include:
segment.target: Typical reasons for a reset include:

segment.source: The device isn’t running well after installing an update.
segment.target: The device isn’t running well after installing an update.

segment.source: You’re repurposing the device for a new meeting space and want to reconfigure it.
segment.target: You’re repurposing the device for a new meeting space and want to reconfigure it.

segment.source: You want to change how you locally manage the device.
segment.target: You want to change how you locally manage the device.

segment.source: Initiating a reset will return the device to the last cumulative Windows update, and remove all local user files and configuration, including:
segment.target: Initiating a reset will return the device to the last cumulative Windows update, and remove all local user files and configuration, including:

segment.source: The device account
segment.target: The device account

segment.source: MDM enrollment
segment.target: MDM enrollment

segment.source: Domain join or Azure AD join information
segment.target: Domain join or Azure AD join information

segment.source: Local admins on the device
segment.target: Local admins on the device

segment.source: Configurations from MDM or the Settings app
segment.target: Configurations from MDM or the Settings app

segment.source: Important Note
segment.target: Important Note

segment.source: Performing a device reset may take up to 6 hours.
segment.target: Performing a device reset may take up to 6 hours.

segment.source: Do not interrupt the reset process.
segment.target: Do not interrupt the reset process.

segment.source: Interrupting the process will render the device inoperable, requiring warranty service to return to normal functionality.
segment.target: Interrupting the process will render the device inoperable, requiring warranty service to return to normal functionality.

segment.source: After the reset, you'll be taken through the first run program again.
segment.target: After the reset, you'll be taken through the first run program again.

segment.target: Related topics
